title: AlphaBheta
author: AlphaBheta
content: As expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.Because we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.Because we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. Reading your post, I think of you likely care more about what's next for altcoins, but not what's next for Bitcoin.Like you want to know what will happen next for Bitcoin because it will result in what will happen next for altcoins that you are really care about.Do you care more about altcoins than about Bitcoin?Believe me, holding and trading Bitcoin is safer a lot than holding and trading altcoins.

comments.author: FortuneFollower
comments.body: Just continue to hodl and forget about the rest.The price will fluctuate more through 2025, and that is completely normal.

comments.author: AlphaBheta
comments.created_time: March 03, 2025, 10:03:57 AMLast edit: March 03, 2025, 01:41:00 PM by hilariousandco
comments.body: Quote from: OcTradism on March 03, 2025, 09:58:16 AMQuote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.Because we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. Reading your post, I think of you likely care more about what's next for altcoins, but not what's next for Bitcoin.Like you want to know what will happen next for Bitcoin because it will result in what will happen next for altcoins that you are really care about.Do you care more about altcoins than about Bitcoin?Believe me, holding and trading Bitcoin is safer a lot than holding and trading altcoins.I understand that BTC sets the pace for altcoins, and whatever it does is usually replicated by this altcoins. That said I don't have a specific altcoin that I care about at the moment, I just hold a general view for altcoins. I can't afford to buy a lot of BTC, my only option is to hold what I have now, and commit funds to other cheaper alts. Quote from: FortuneFollower on March 03, 2025, 10:00:57 AMJust continue to hodl and forget about the rest.The price will fluctuate more through 2025, and that is completely normal. I made the decision to HODL a long time, and I'm not changing that now, Ideally I'd like to buy more, but I can't at the moment.

comments.author: macson
comments.body: Bitcoin has been on a strong recovery for the past few days after dropping to 75k some time ago. this was triggered by positive news showing Trump's commitment to create a US crypto reserve. This is good news for the crypto market because people are waiting for Trump's commitment to fulfill his promise to create a crypto reserve for America. and this news could provide something positive for the crypto market in the future.But maybe this positive trend will continue until the crypto summit later, which is planned to be held this weekend. investors want to see how regulation and innovation in the cryptocurrency sector are, and from that, many investors may decide to enter the market or not. so let's just wait patiently to see the results of this summit.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.Because we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. You kidding right? because we can't put any timeline, and just like that, Bitcoin goes down from $95k to $92k currently, so it's just temporary but obviously there are a lot of short term traders or speculators who might have taken advantage of the situation and squeeze some profits.And it just shows how volatile the market will and will be in the future. So we don't know, at least we should be in the bullish trend still for this year but there could be a lot of humps along the way that it's really hard to see what will be all time high for this cycle.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: The downtrend can be easily predicted as ATH mostly defines the depth of the correction and the bottom but for now it can be said that $79k is the bottom for now (unless something big happens) so determining the end of the uptrend will be bad but at least the price will increase on a weekly basis.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on March 03, 2025, 11:00:24 AMThe downtrend can be easily predicted as ATH mostly defines the depth of the correction and the bottom but for now it can be said that $79k is the bottom for now (unless something big happens) so determining the end of the uptrend will be bad but at least the price will increase on a weekly basis.Or the bottom can define what will be the top price for this bull run cycle, and with $79k, it might be 2x, so it's possible to look at the last all time high could be around $158k give or take. And it could be the just the minimum as it's possible that it could move as high as $180k as that's where most of the predictions.Of course it can still go as high as we don't have the crystal ball and see the future.But at least, just be conservative and not expect very high price so that we won't be discourage or something. Just like in the last bull run wherein there is that 6 digits that we all wanted to see but it turns out that the all time high is $69k in 2021.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.No one knows for how long this trend will last. The correction was in, the recovery was in and the stability of Bitcoin shows above $78k is there as well. We probably have seen the dip and bottom of this cycle but we don't know for how long it will hold. We're trying to break and hit back $100k and more, so it's only a matter of time and give it time maybe until this year ends and things might go easy and favorable to all of us.Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMBecause we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. Just expect that for several months for this year, we're still in the bullish form. But if all of a sudden, more negative news and hacking comes and the market plummets a lot, that might be a sign but we have to wait for confirmation. It's pretty likely that 2026 is the bear market.

comments.author: Ziskinberg
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.Because we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. You probably asked yourself the same question when Bitcoin was dumping, and honestly, the answer is we don’t know. No one expected Trump to suddenly announce crypto as part of the U.S. reserve. There were speculations before, but no one saw it happening this soon.So, just like before, if we trusted the market when it was dumping, then we should trust it even more when it’s pumping. Maybe it’s best to keep holding, or if you’re thinking of investing, it’s still a good time, because we might just be on our way to a new ATH.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.Because we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. There are many many variables which can/could contribute to what direction the Bitcoin markettakes at any time. We can only speculate as to what way its going to go in the medium term.Based solely on the last halving we should see an new ATH later this year, in the second half perhapsand after that we should enter a bear season based on past historical moves and follow Bitcoins4 year cycle.Some commentators have spoken about an end to historical market movements because things havechanged now but that will all remain to be seen.I recon thats the best timeline you will get - Bitcoin following its 4 year cycle between halvings.And please be prepared for big pullbacks like we just had from ~$100k to ~$78k and correction back to ~$94k in the future.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on March 03, 2025, 11:00:24 AMThe downtrend can be easily predicted as ATH mostly defines the depth of the correction and the bottom but for now it can be said that $79k is the bottom for now (unless something big happens) so determining the end of the uptrend will be bad but at least the price will increase on a weekly basis.Viewing the market and Bitcoin price in yearly chart is better than doing this with shorter timeframe charts like daily, hourly.https://charts.bitbo.io/yearly-candles/It gives us overview on market cycle, years of bear and years of bull as well as how price acted in past cycles from ATHs and from bottoms.https://www.bitcoincyclescomparison.com/

comments.author: WatChe
comments.body: Quote from: Ziskinberg on March 03, 2025, 11:33:37 AMYou probably asked yourself the same question when Bitcoin was dumping, and honestly, the answer is we don’t know. No one expected Trump to suddenly announce crypto as part of the U.S. reserve. There were speculations before, but no one saw it happening this soon.So, just like before, if we trusted the market when it was dumping, then we should trust it even more when it’s pumping. Maybe it’s best to keep holding, or if you’re thinking of investing, it’s still a good time, because we might just be on our way to a new ATH.We saw Bitcoin making it to new ATH last year after Bitcoin ETF's were launched. Now President Trump naming five cryptocurrencies as part of his proposed reserve of digital assets, this may start another era where Bitcoin's may seeing new ATH's. News have huge impact on Bitcoin price, Bitcoin went above 90k after the news of crypto reserve broke out. Likewise Bitcoin price can go down with same speed in case there is negative news about Bitcoin. Whatever decision one make about investing in bitcoin, just keep this thing in mind that news can swing Bitcoin price in both directions. It's best to invest for long term based on your research rather then on news that pump Bitcoin price.

comments.author: Swapter.io
comments.body: Over the past week, Bitcoin has been highly sensitive to news, which is why we’ve seen such fluctuations in price. I think the more the U.S. talks about it, the less sensitive it will become to these statements. HODLing still seems to be the most promising approach

comments.author: Pandorak
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.Because we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. After the last few weeks the crypto world has gotten a lot of bad news, one of the worst is the theft of more than $1.4 billion from Bybit, these thieves managed to take advantage of the bybit team negligence to successfully steal the money, even though all wallets connected to the money have been marked, this has a significant impact on prices in the market, especially Bitcoin.I think Bitcoin price will enter an uptrend phase, provided that good news continues to come out, this can lead to increased holder confidence, which has an impact on price increases. However, the potential for Bitcoin to go back down is very large, we don't expect it to happen in the near future, for a while maybe Bitcoin will sideaway until waiting for the breakout moment.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Pandorak on March 03, 2025, 01:10:12 PMAfter the last few weeks the crypto world has gotten a lot of bad news, one of the worst is the theft of more than $1.4 billion from Bybit, these thieves managed to take advantage of the bybit team negligence to successfully steal the money, even though all wallets connected to the money have been marked, this has a significant impact on prices in the market, especially Bitcoin.You missed later report and forensic analysis that mistakes and security faults are from Safe, the multisig wallet provider, not from Bybit.It is truly big bad news but Bybit resolved that situation well and there was no bankrun that could kill Bybit like FTX years ago. It's positive news after all and yesterday Donald J. Trump announced his national strategic cryptocurrency reserve for the USA. Surprising enough that Bitcoin is not mentioned but Bitcoin managed to soar about 10% yesterday and nearly reclaim what it lost after Bybit hack last week.Quote from: WatChe on March 03, 2025, 12:14:54 PMWe saw Bitcoin making it to new ATH last year after Bitcoin ETF's were launched. Now President Trump naming five cryptocurrencies as part of his proposed reserve of digital assets, this may start another era where Bitcoin's may seeing new ATH's. News have huge impact on Bitcoin price, Bitcoin went above 90k after the news of crypto reserve broke out. Likewise Bitcoin price can go down with same speed in case there is negative news about Bitcoin. I believe Donald Trump will add Bitcoin to this reserve later, and I also believe that Bitcoin will repeat its history and cycle pattern. This year will be a bullish year for Bitcoin and it will make a new ATH in this year but how high the absolute ATH for Bitcoin in this market cycle, this year 2025, I can not say.

comments.author: TradingHippo
comments.body: Massive bearish parabloic orderflow within next few hours

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Bitcoin has +2% rally at 18:49 and people already ask how long it lasts and what is next at 18:50.  Wake up people, be real.It is going through a phase it has never been in before.  Bitcoin is entering the Reserve of The United States.  This is history and the market may make new history too.  So no, none of us 'knows' what is next or how long this lasts.  We can only pretend we know, or we can try to predict.  Nothing more.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMAs expected, because of the recent BTC price surge other altcoin are on the move upward, and I'm sure a lot of people saw this coming, but I think the real question now is how long this trend would last.No one can give an perfect answer to this, because each day in cryptocurrency comes with its own challenge and advantage, bitcoin can be fast rising early this morning and before evening you discover that it's going the opposite direction being bearish, same time the altcoins may be rising together or not, as we also know that they have their own separate season, but mostly work by the bitcoin way of rise and fall before their own full season emerged, some altcoins may even be rising whereby if we are not in the bullrun season, you may find out that bitcoin is bearish then, this is how we have been having mixed reactions of the bitcoin market in relation to other cryptocurrencies depending on time and season.Quote from: AlphaBheta on March 03, 2025, 09:56:17 AMBecause we've been here a couple of time, and it would be cool if we can put a timeline on this, if it's just a temporary move, and even if it isn't, how long can we expect the bullish trend to last. DYOR.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: We can not expect how long the bullish trend to last because no clear sign about that. We can only guess and hope that we are right. If we lose our chance, that will not easy to get back and make a profit so we need to be careful to decide.Bitcoin will get the bull run and so do altcoin will get the altcoin season. You only need to wait and see and prepare your coins so you will get the opportunity to make a big profit. We may difficult to imagine what coin that will explode this year because the number of the coins in the market is too big. Perhaps the position in the market will change and fills for the new coins so you need to watch out of that.
